title: december 2: polk’s destiny
description:
Today on the pod, Maia talks about James Polk and his implementation of manifest destiny, from Polk’s childhood and political career to his role in Westward expansion and its complications. Then she talks about the beginning of a music chart for modern life online, the Billboard Social 50. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
